= `create-react-app`
:url-website: https://create-react-app.dev/
:url-github: https://github.com/facebook/create-react-app

{url-website}[[website\]]
{url-github}[[github\]]

== Installation

Create a new react app (`./PRJ_NAME/` will be created):

[,bash]
----
pnpx create-react-app PRJ_NAME
----

== Running

[,bash]
----
pnpm start
----
